venue_address_line1: 800 N Auburn Rd, Venice, FL 34292, USA
venue_description: Established in 1983, Fox Lea Farm is a privately owned, nationally recognized horse show facility in Venice, Florida. It hosts a variety of horse shows throughout the year, attracting competitors from across the country and internationally. The showgrounds are minutes from the beaches and host more than 42 events annually, making the venue a major contributor to sports tourism in Sarasota Countyhttps://www.foxleafarm.net/#:~:text=Established%20in%201983%2C%20Fox%20Lea,Spectators%20Welcome.

Use real A-circuit phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling, drags, splits). No fluff.","Buckets":[{"label":"–$$$","description":"Practical/groom-friendly within ~20–25 min; easy surface lots; walkable food."},{"label":"$$$$","description":"Owner-trainer/boutique up to ~35 min; quiet, reliable service; valet/self-park clarity."}],"Must_have_amenities_any":["reliable Wi-Fi","late check-in","early coffee or breakfast","laundry access (in-house or nearby)","truck/trailer-friendly or large surface lot"],"Hard_excludes":["Motel 6","Red Roof Inn","Econo Lodge","Super 8","Rodeway Inn","weekly-rate motels","properties with persistent safety complaints"],"Safety emphasis":["well-lit parking","quiet rooms (away from nightlife)","walkable dining for grooms"],"Name_parsing":"If brand + locality (e.g., 'Hilton Garden Inn Ocala Downtown'), set hotel_name='Hilton Garden Inn', name2='Ocala Downtown'. If generic (e.g., 'Equus Inn Ocala'), set hotel_name='Equus Inn', name2='Ocala'.\",\"Chain_parsing\": \"If chain provided like 'Hilton (Hilton Garden Inn)', set chain='Hilton', chain2='Hilton Garden Inn'. Else chain='Independent', chain2='Independent'.","Amenity_normalization":"Return amenities as a semicolon-separated string OR array; prefer concise, rider-useful items (early breakfast, laundry, parking notes).","Safety_notes_style":"One sentence, concrete location/policy guidance (e.g., 'Use garage; avoid street parking with tack.').","Approx_drive_format":"Use ranges like '20–25 min'; reflect typical traffic on US-301/Largo/Bowie corridors.","Flagged budget motel chains to avoid":"Motel 6, Red Roof Inn, Econo Lodge, Super 8, Rodeway Inn.","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/hotel-curator_example.json","Duplicates":"Deduplicate near-identical listings; prefer the newest/most reliable page.","Minimum required JSON fields":"venue_uid, bucket, name, approx_drive, chain, amenities, address, safety_notes, url"}]

Use authentic insider phrasing (warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, stabling).","Tone":"upbeat, practical, authoritative.","Official venue link":"https://www.foxleafarm.net/","Constraints":null,"Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "foxl-venue-sec",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "Fox Lea Farm — Venue Profile",
  "section_overview": "Venice vibes with A-circuit efficiency. Fox Lea runs a tight schedule with straightforward ring flow, easy jog strip access, and a compact layout that keeps stabling, warm-up, and vendor row within quick walking or golf-cart range. Footing rides forgiving with a sand base—great for hunters and eq—while jumpers get consistent purchase once the rings have a little traffic. Mornings are cool with a Gulf breeze; by mid-day expect humidity and sun, so plan shade breaks, electrolytes, and cool towels. Drags are punctual, schooling rings turn over fast, and the show office crew is helpful if you need a last-minute add/scratch. Keep your trunks tidy and staged—classes can move sooner than you think here.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "Fox Lea Farm",
    "Venice FL",
    "hunter jumper",
    "A-circuit",
    "equitation",
    "Grand Prix",
    "warm-up ring",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "show schedule",
    "ring flow"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Dial in your Fox Lea game plan",
  "section_img": "https://www.foxleafarm.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/fox-lea-farm-grounds.jpg",
  "section_img_alt": "Show rings and stabling at Fox Lea Farm in Venice, Florida",
  "section_link": "https://www.foxleafarm.net/",
  "section_meta_description": "Insider venue profile for Fox Lea Farm (Venice, FL): warm-up flow, jog strip, vendor row, stabling layout, footing notes, and time-saving tips for A-circuit hunter/jumper riders.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "Fox Lea Farm — Venue Guide for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Practical notes on ring flow, the jog strip, vendor row essentials, stabling logistics, and footing so you can move efficiently all week at Fox Lea.",
  "section_search_title": "Fox Lea Farm Venue Profile (Venice, FL)",
  "section_search_description": "Authoritative, rider-focused overview of Fox Lea Farm: warm-up strategy, jog strip details, vendor row, stabling, and day-of-show logistics for hunters, eq, and jumpers.",
  "section_spotlight": {
    "title": "Quick Hits for Fox Lea",
    "bullets": [
      "Warm-up timing: busiest 30–45 min before eq and jr/am hunter starts—grab a fence right after a drag for clean approaches.",
      "Jog strip: be ring-ready with clean legs and visible number; a towel + hoof oil live in the backpack for fast polish.",
      "Footing: sand base rides best after a little traffic—plan your last oxer once the top is packed, not freshly dragged.",
      "Shade & hydration: midday sun is real—stage coolers, electrolytes, and spare gloves by the schooling gate.",
      "Stabling flow: trunks tight to the line, fans strapped, wash racks rotate quickly—stage ice boots and towels outside the stall.",
      "Vendor row: quick fixes—spur straps, hairnets, gloves, hoof oil, studs—plus on-the-spot braiding and minor tack repairs.",
      "Ring hustle: add 5 extra minutes for hunter rings nearest vendor row; golf carts move fastest right after drags.",
      "Scheduling: farrier/vet is easiest mid-afternoon between eq blocks; hay/shavings deliveries land smoothly post-lunch.",
      "Weather watch: coastal showers pop up—pack quarter sheets and a spare pad; numbers secure with clips or tape.",
      "Food plan: grab-and-go early; lines build around noon when eq and hunter drags stack."
    ]
  }
}

TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"Fox Lea Farm","state_uid":["recZ6xyhhJQaARhCY"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.foxleafarm.net/","city_uid":["reckO7ZUsWjej2OcG"],"placeId":"Eio4MDAgTiBBdWJ1cm4gUmQgIzJjLCBWZW5pY2UsIEZMIDM0MjkyLCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCdthcqqFWsOIETTGDb8vSRMsEgIyYw","formatted_addressv3":"800 N Auburn Rd, Venice, FL 34292, USA","venue_recordId":"recezWFBm7oSFHo8J"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"Fox Lea Farm","state_uid":["recZ6xyhhJQaARhCY"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.foxleafarm.net/","city_uid":["reckO7ZUsWjej2OcG"],"placeId":"Eio4MDAgTiBBdWJ1cm4gUmQgIzJjLCBWZW5pY2UsIEZMIDM0MjkyLCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCdthcqqFWsOIETTGDb8vSRMsEgIyYw","formatted_addressv3":"800 N Auburn Rd, Venice, FL 34292, USA","venue_recordId":"recezWFBm7oSFHo8J"}]), Fox Lea Farm represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 800 N Auburn Rd, Venice, FL 34292, USA, GEO context: lat=27.1183359, lon=-82.3960331 placeid=Eio4MDAgTiBBdWJ1cm4gUmQgIzJjLCBWZW5pY2UsIEZMIDM0MjkyLCBVU0EiHhocChYKFAoSCdthcqqFWsOIETTGDb8vSRMsEgIyYw., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes

tone: practical, insider, authoritative (Eastern Time (ET), Florida-specific phrasing).
audience: competitive hunter/jumper riders on the A-circuit. Trainers, grooms. Prioritize limited time, convenience, and services used around horse shows.
venue_short_description: Fox Lea Farm in Venice, FL is a notable hub for A-circuit competition.
venue_descriptionv2: Established in 1983, Fox Lea Farm is a privately owned, nationally recognized horse show facility in Venice, Florida. It hosts a variety of horse shows throughout the year, attracting competitors from across the country and internationally. The showgrounds are minutes from the beaches and host more than 42 events annually, making the venue a major contributor to sports tourism in Sarasota Countyhttps://www.foxleafarm.net/#:~:text=Established%20in%201983%2C%20Fox%20Lea,Spectators%20Welcome.
